author: Simon Marks
title: Coronavirus ends China's honeymoon in Africa
description: Beijing has spent billions to win friends and influence politics in Africa. But the virus is threatening to upend years of careful work.
content: But that decades-long quest for influence in Africa was gravely challenged last week when a group of disgruntled African ambassadors in Beijing wrote to Foreign Affairs Minister Wang Yi to complain that citizens from Togo, Nigeria and Benin living in Guangzho… [+7883 chars]
